oai_dc:dc.dc:title: INTERACTION OF INERT-GAS ATOMS WITH SOME CLOSED-SHELL CATIONS AND FORMATION OF CLUSTER MOLECULES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PATIL, SH
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: local pseudopotential calculations
gaseous ion mobility
interaction potentials
arbitrary strength
electric-fields
systems
ar
kr
xe
polarizabilities
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We have analyzed the interaction of inert-gas atoms with some closed-shell ions such as alkali and alkaline-earth ions. A pertubative approach leading to exchange-Coulomb and asymptotic terms allows us to calculate the equilibrium properties of the cluster molecules formed by these systems.
